clickable.description: Denotes whether action should be taken on user interaction

index.description: Slide index to enable annotation visibility or camera aim/position

persistTo.description: Slide index to persist to for annotation visibility or camera aim/position

animationSubClips.description: Animation sub-clip frame durations (order: rest-pose, on-enter, on-demand, on-idle, on-exit)

default.description: Use as default Material if swappable

index.description: Slide index to enable material visibility

persistTo.description: Slide index to persist to for material visibility

swap.description: Material can be swapped with default Material

toggle.description: Material can be toggled on and off

animationSubClips.description: Animation sub-clip frame durations (order: rest-pose, on-enter, on-demand, on-idle, on-exit)

animationName.description: Name of the animated object to source animation from

scaleToCam.description: Object size will appear the same, regardless of distance from camera
